Paint 21

CHASSIS SPOT REPAIR, Repair

Includes:
1. Clean
2. Blow off
3. Apply top coat
4. Includes frame rails and any other components attached to the chassis

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One Chassis All Spots A21-105 All Models 0.8

FUEL TANK PAINT REPAIR REQUIRING TANK REPOSITIONING OR REMOVAL, Repair

Includes:
1. Drain and fill fuel tank when required
2. R&R Fuel tank when required

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Spot repair (less than 25% surface area) A21-107 All Models 1.3
Complete repaint (more than 25% surface area) A21-108 All Models 2.7

SPOT REPAIR (GLAMOUR SURFACES) - ONE TO THREE SPOTS, Repair

Includes:
1. Any glamour surface as defined under "Term Definitions"

Notes:
1. The hood/fender assembly is considered to be two panels divided on the center line of the hood except for 9100, 9200, and 9400 built 6/24/96 or later
2. The 9100, 9200, and 9400 built 6/24/96 and later are considered as having three panels

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Buff and Polish One Spot Any Location A21-100 All Models 0.7
Buff and Polish Each Additional Spot A21-101 All Models 0.4
Color/Clear Coat Up to (3) Spots in any one panel A21-102 All Models 1.6
Primer and Color/Clear Coat Up to (3) Spots in any one panel A21-103 All Models 2.1
Color/Clear Coat Up to (3) Spots in each adjacent panel(s) A21-104 All Models 0.8
Primer and Color/Clear Coat Up to (3) Spots in each adjacent panel(s) A21-106 All Models 1.0

WARRANTY OPERATIONS NOT COVERED IN THIS SECTION, T-Time

Notes:
1. This is not to be used to code diagnosis, testing or cleaning of operations already covered in this section. The time for those items is included in the operation. A written description or explanation must accompany each

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
T-TIME A21-T1 All Models 0.0
T-TIME A21-T2 All Models 0.0
T-TIME A21-T3 All Models 0.0
